DOC.brief_title: Changes Ankle Range Motion Following Subtalar Joint Manipulation
DOC.detailed_description: Ankle inversion sprain common injury cause joint stiffness range motion deficit . ( Holmer 1994 , Beynnon 2001 , Denegar 2002 , Green 2001 ) Subtalar joint manipulation advocate intervention inversion sprain reduce pain , decrease joint stiffness , improve range motion . ( Lopez-Rodriguez 2007 ) The ankle comprise talocrural subtalar joint respective joint ax . ( Hubbard 2006 ) Ankle rotation ax parameterized use quaternion , four dimensional unit vector . Range motion ( ROM ) ax determine perform eigen analysis quaternion matrix determine root mean square value motion data ax . The objective study investigate immediate effect subtalar joint manipulation ROM ankle 's talocrural subtalar joint ankle sustain subacute , grade II inversion sprain . Twenty patient one sprain ankle one asymptomatic ankle recruit . The sprained ankle patient receive standardize subtalar joint manipulation . The patient 's asymptomatic ankle serve non-treatment control group . Range motion pre- post-manipulation quantify utilizing quaternion eigen analysis . Kinematic kinetic parameter collect manipulation biomechanically characterize manipulation . Pain pressure threshold visual analog scale measurement pain , stiffness , quality movement collect . Our primary hypothesis subtalar joint manipulation increase subtalar ROM , effect talocrural ROM . Our secondary hypothesis subtalar joint manipulation positive effect pain , stiffness , quality movement .
